cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.CY, cs.DB, cs.LG. 

The paper discusses the use of Zero Knowledge Proofs (ZKP) in Distributed Ledger Technology (DLT) and blockchain, which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). The paper also discusses the efficiency and optimization of ZKP, which could fall under the categories of distributed computing (cs.DC) and machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also discusses the potential use cases of ZKP, which could fall under the categories of cryptography (cs.CR) and data management (cs.DB) or cybernetics (cs.CY).
